name: guardianchain-fullstack
description: GuardianChain - Full Stack Decentralized Reporting Platform

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && mkdir -p api/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* api/public/
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd api && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
